summary: This mod is for BodySlide++ it comes with the presets for the bodies, along with some textures for the bodies, and the meshes themselves.
descriptionHtml:
All credit goes to Caliente and ChronoTrigger77, for this content. The only work I did was fiddle with some settings and draw a bra onto a skin texture.

Reason for this mod; I had always enjoyed playing games like Fable, where you start as a young child and age, while developing your character. I wanted to immerse myself in a similar manner in skyrim with my newest character.

So I got Bodyslide++ and set up a body structure, that I had enjoyed, that could go from a thin child to a average woman, to a woman whom was over weight, creating a nice dynamic of bodies.

My next step was to add a bra to the nude texture, rather than using the bra mesh. I had a reason for this as I wanted to use, 
\"Modesty Chainmail and Undergarments - Body Tattoos for RaceMenu\" > http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37962/?
However, this was not possible due to the bra mesh, and I don\'t like running around nude on characters, so this small retexture was my alternative. The bra was bump mapped to look like silk and have a nice glow. I think it turned out well. Hope you all enjoy!

Mods used;
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32731/?]BodySlide[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/?]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url]

Please endorse those files, as they are wonderful mods!
author: PaulImposteur

files.name: Young to Womanly with Alt Textures
